ygData.subject: Re: Verant Email text
ygData.msgSnippet: Wizards and probably enchanters (I wouldn t know I ve never played one) have a horrible time starting out, therefore, to balance, we should become the most
ygData.messageBody:
Wizards and probably enchanters (I wouldn't know I've never played one) have
a horrible time starting out, therefore, to balance, we should become the
most powerful at the higher levels. To me it seems that Verant's "balancing"
is that everyone starts out different, but in the end we're all equal. I
wouldn't know because I'm just a lowly lvl 14, but from what I hear on this
mailing list, this is the way it is.
n a message dated 5/27/99 3:37:56 PM Eastern Daylight Time,
Sean.Clark@... writes:

<< From: Sean.Clark@...

On ballance...anybody can ballance a game that olny gives you THREE options
for race/class!
I think that Verant has done a pretty good job of ballancing...they just
need to continue with MINOR tweaking as time goes on to maintain the
ballance.
Just my hyumble opinion :)'
Seran >>
